senses.sense_definition: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi, commonly known as Mahatma Gandhi, a political and spiritual leader who led the Indian independence movement through nonviolent resistance.

examples.text: Mahatma <w>Gandhi</w> inspired millions of people with his peaceful protests.
We studied the life and teachings of <w>Gandhi</w> in our history lesson.
Rahul <w>Gandhi</w> gave a speech at the rally yesterday.
Please deliver this package to Mr. <w>Gandhi</w> on the second floor.

senses.sense_definition: Someone who lives in accordance with the lifestyle or ethical principles of Mahatma <w>Gandhi</w>, such as nonviolence and simplicity.

examples.text: He is a true <w>Gandhi</w> in his approach to resolving community conflicts.
The movement needs a <w>Gandhi</w> to lead it with moral authority.
